contentList.content: A collection of tips, tricks, and cantrips for the well-prepared adventurer.
Within its pages, this tattered, unremarkable tome might just hold the key to surviving your adventures.
Weave together your spells to fortify your party.
Boost your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by a selected amount (up to 30).
Boost your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> by a selected amount (up to 30).
Boost your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> by a selected amount (up to 30).
Boost your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> by a selected amount (up to 30).
Boost your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> by a selected amount (up to 30).
Boost your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by a selected amount (up to 30).

Boost your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by a selected amount (up to 30).

Unlock the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AdventurersCompendium_BoostAbilities">Boost Abilities</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AdventurersCompendium_BoostStrength">Boost Strength</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AdventurersCompendium_BoostDexterity">Boost Dexterity</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AdventurersCompendium_BoostConstitution">Boost Constitution</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AdventurersCompendium_BoostIntelligence">Boost Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AdventurersCompendium_BoostWisdom">Boost Wisdom</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AdventurersCompendium_BoostCharisma">Boost Charisma</LSTag> class actions.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Light Armour.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Light and Medium Armour.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Light, Medium, and Heavy Armour.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with Simple and Martial Weapons.

At level 2, unlock <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_ActionSurge">Action Surge</LSTag>. At level 5, unlock <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack</LSTag>. At level 8, unlock <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="FastHands">Fast Hands</LSTag>. Finally, at level 11, unlock <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack_2">Improved Extra Attack</LSTag>.
